import React, { useRef, useState } from 'react'; import contactStyle from './ContactStyle.module.css' import emailjs from 'emailjs-com' export const Contact = () => { const form = useRef(); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm("service_05tm4ij","template_a0yazuh", form.current,'wWbb2c9phUC-l3ssR') .then(res=>{ console.log(res); alert("Your message sent!") form.current.reset(); }) .catch(error=>{ console.log(error) alert("Fail to sent, Check email and try again") }) }; return (
